author: slive
msg: The module name changes will probably hit people in
run-time configuration at least as much as in
compile-time, so mention it there as well.

author: jeremias
msg: Negative widths on inline-progression-dimension and block-progression-dimension should be treated as 0pt but they are currently not.

author: jeremias
msg: Support checking for the subcomponents of length-range properties in the FO Tree tests.

author: slive
msg: Make the upgrading doc more user-friendly by explicitly
stating some places where things *haven't* changed.
The statement about third-party modules could use some
review by someone who has tried some.

author: jeremias
msg: Relaxed validation for border and padding on region-*.
